title: Secondary Mathematics Practical Competency Enhancement Program Using a Multi-Intelligent Mentor System

context.prior_knowledge: Core Middle School Mathematics Concepts and Practical Application Experience
context.additional_context: Multi-agent-based collaborative learning environment provided to secondary school teachers for solving problems encountered in mathematics education

learning_goals: Learners can implement math problem-solving strategies with over 80% accuracy by interacting with a multi-intelligent mentor system
Users can distinguish the roles of Expert, Motivator, and Mentor agents in a VR simulation environment and utilize them contextually
Learners can improve self-efficacy by over 30% based on system feedback and systematically solve complex math problems
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
